author: joes
msg: Minor refactoring - move assignment of ctx->saw_eos closer to the conditionals that check for it.

author: joes
msg: Track saw_eos condition to prevent extraneous calls to ap_get_brigade, which leads to problems caused by having multiple EOS buckets appear in the resulting brigades.

author: grisha
msg: Returned server.my_generation, which got lost somewhere.
